category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA84_mapping_decimal_separator
preference.preference_description: Tthrough this option it is possible to define the symbol to be used as decimal separator when converting a double attribute to string or when parsing a string attribute to be converted to double attribute. Therefore it plays a role in the following attribute mapping scenarios: - when formatting a Teamcenter double attribute to an AutoCAD string attribute - when parsing an AutoCAD string attribute to be converted to a Teamcenter double attribute The default value is the decimal point ".".
